description:
Spark tries to keep Neese out of harm’s way as the group travels through dangerous lands to Marmo. At the same time, Neese wants to prove her strength and helps him fight a deadly menace.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retrouvailles dans un lointain pays en guerre
Reunion... In a Distant War-torn Land
Saikai... Tooki Senran no Ikoku de
再会... 遠き戦乱の異国で
